Uses of Class
xxl.core.predicates.AbstractPredicate

  • Packages that use AbstractPredicate 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.sweepAreas
    This package provides so-called SweepAreas.
    xxl.core.predicates
    This package provides Predicates.
    xxl.core.spatial.cursors
    Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data.
    xxl.core.spatial.geometries.predicates
    Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, DistanceWithin, etc .
    xxl.core.spatial.predicates
    Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, Within (Euclidean distance), etc .

    • Uses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.collections.sweepAreas

      Subclasses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.collections.sweepAreas 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DefaultMemoryManageableSA.EveryQth<E>
      This inner class provides a predicate for the remove filter for the load shedder.

    • Uses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.predicates

      Subclasses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.predicates 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMetaDataPredicate<P,M>
      An abstract implementation of the interface MetaDataPredicate that extends the class AbstractPredicate.
      class  AllPredicate<P>
      This class provides a prototypical implementation of the all-predicate.
      class  And<P>
      This class provides a logical AND predicate.
      class  AnyPredicate<P>
      This class provides a prototypical implementation of the any-predicate.
      class  BinaryPredicate<P>
      This class provides a higher-order predicate (in other words, this predicate decorates two input predicates).
      class  BindingPredicate<P>
      This class provides a predicate whose arguments are partially bound to some constant objects.
      class  ComparatorBasedEqual<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the specified comparator returns 0.
      class  ComparatorPredicate<P>
      This abstract class provides a predicate that uses an underlying comparator for determining whether it is fulfilled or not.
      class  DistanceWithin<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether the distance between two given objects is less or equal a given epsilon distance.
      class  Equal<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether two given arguments are equal.
      class  EqualReference<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether two given arguments have the same reference.
      class  EveryNth<P>
      This class provides an unary predicate that returns a boolean value for every n-th argument.
      class  ExistPredicate<P>
      This class provides a prototypical implementation of the exist-predicate.
      class  FunctionPredicate<P>
      This class provides a wrapper that wraps a function to a predicate.
      class  Greater<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is greater than the second.
      class  GreaterEqual<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is greater than or equal to the second.
      class  Indicator<P>
      Implements an indicator for a given collection.
      class  InputStreamEqualPredicate
      This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the input stream given as the first argument is equal to the second.
      class  Less<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is less than the second.
      class  LessEqual<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is less than or equal to the second.
      class  MultiFeaturePredicate<P,R>
      This class provides a decorator predicate that applies a fixed number number of mapping functions to the arguments of the underlying predicate.
      class  NotEqual<P>
      This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether two given arguments are equal.
      class  Or<P>
      This class provides a logical OR predicate.
      class  Xor<P>
      This class provides a logical XOR predicate.

    • Uses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.spatial.cursors

      Subclasses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.spatial.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GESS.ReferencePointMethod
      This class provides the Reference Point Method of GESS.
      static class  Replicator.MaxGeneration
      Allows at most bound generations (2^(generation) replicates are created).
      static class  Replicator.MaxReplicates
      Constrains replication to 'bound' replicates per input-element.
      static class  Replicator.MaxSplitBit
      Allows splits if the actual bitIndex is greater or equal than a given bound.
      static class  Replicator.MaxSplitLevel
      Allows splits if the level is smaller or equal than a given bitIndex.
      static class  Replicator.MaxSplitsPerLevel
      Allows at most bound splits per level.
      static class  Replicator.Split
      Abstract Predicate used to decide whether further splits are allowed.

    • Uses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.spatial.geometries.predicates

      Subclasses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.spatial.geometries.predicates 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Contains
      A predicate that returns true if the first given geometry contains the other one.
      class  Covers
      A predicate that returns true if geometry0 covers geometry1.
      class  Crosses
      A predicate that returns true if geometry0 crosses geometry1.
      class  Equals
      A predicate that returns true if geometry0 equals geometry1 spatially.
      class  Intersects
      A predicate that returns true if geometry0 intersects geometry1.
      class  Overlaps
      A predicate that returns true if geometry0 overlaps geometry1.
      class  Relate
      A predicate that returns true if the spatial relationship specified by the patternMatrix holds.
      class  Touches
      A predicate that returns true if geometry0 touches geometry1.
      class  TuplePredicate<T>
      A predicate applicable to arrays.
      class  Within
      A predicate that returns true if the first given geometry is within the other one.

    • Uses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.spatial.predicates

      Subclasses of AbstractPredicate in xxl.core.spatial.predicates 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContainsPredicate
      A predicate that returns true if object0 contains object1.
      class  DimOverlapPredicate
      A predicate that returns true if two Rectangles overlap in a user-specified dimension.
      class  DistanceWithinEuclidean
      A distance predicate based on the euclidean distance-measure (This distance-measure corresponds to the L_2-metric).
      class  DistanceWithinMaximum<P extends Point>
      A distance predicate based on the euclidean distance-measure (This distance-measure corresponds to the L_infinity-metric).
      class  OverlapsPredicate
      A predicate that returns true if object0 overlaps object1.
      class  UnitCubeConstraint
      The UnitCubeConstraint-predicate checks if the argument (which is assumed to be a Point) is inside the unit-cube [0;1)^dim.
